By the way. The novel will be an Nft and will include 10 (or more) original tracks for all collectors.

And a lot of AI generated images.

So stay tuned.

First thing in the morning:

Make the bed.

If I fail to make my bed (laziness, time, forgetfulness) then my projects fall into that pattern too.

Discipline is the core of my progress. And it is measured by this simple act.

Alex Hormozi said that I had a wallet of money, and a wallet of minutes.

So I do the math:

. Figure out my monthly expenses and reduce them by 5%.
. Identify superficial conversations and reduce them by 5% .
. Where does my income come from? 20% more of it .
. Who do I learn the most from? 20% more of that too.

Simple. Right now writing it's the thing I foresee the most profit for me in the future. So I double down on that (I'm writing a cyberpunk novel)

On the other hand, I get lost in conversations that let me nowhere, so the goal is to engage in conversations with people that have something to teach me.

This platform has surprised me!

44 followers in just one week!üî•

Like here, the community. It's a full ecosystem, with a lot of apps interconnected, but not fully decentralized, only federated. 

It's built on top of a protocol named Activity pub. I heard that Threads (Meta) plans to connect to the protocol too.

Sorry, I'm far to be an expert, you can find more detail info online

Now I understand. I didn't see the key differences regarding ownership of the account. It's the wallet! 
For example, I move my Mastodon account from one server to another, but the old one is still there. I keep the people I follow but I have to notice the people who follow me.
The process was fast, though.

5 quick tips to improve the acoustic treatment in your recording booth :

1- Use acoustic panels
2- Cover hard surfaces
3- Position speakers correctly
4- Use diffusers to disperse the sound
5- Place bass traps in the corners.

"If you are writing on your own platform hoping an audience will come to you, that‚Äôs Blogging. 

And if you are bringing your voice to a platform where an audience already exists, that‚Äôs Online Writing."

The Art and Business of Writing Online.
Nicolas Cole.

The future of Music is decentralization. It's becoming clearer every day.

We have, on one hand, giants like Spotify rewarding top quality tracks with pennies.

Meanwhile, on platforms like Sound.xyz the artist controls how much they earn.

And, boy, they are winning!üíµ
